author: Nicole Weaver
title: 10 Hot Sex Stories By Real People Confessing SUPER Naughty Secrets
text:
Photo: Whisper 
Hooking Up With The Best Friend's Brother 
"I was staying at my best mate's house. We were in bed and I got a text from her brother saying let's play. I sneaked into his room and we had sex, it was so exciting. My mate still doesn't know. She would kill me." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Super Bowl Affairs 
"The best sex I had was with another man's wife while he was in the next room hosting a super bowl party. They are still together with two kids." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Discovering New Kinks 
"My boyfriend started lightly spanking my ass mid-sex last night. The more he spanked, the tighter I got. I love it." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Shower Sex With A Brother's Friend 
"My brother's best friend just walked in on me in the shower. He tried to leave but I didn't let him! We had shower sex and it was great." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Risky But Hot 
"Had sex with my boyfriend in his room with the door open... his parents were home, too." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Stress Relief Before Diving Into Work 
"Woke up, showered, did makeup, got dressed for work. On my way out the door is when my boyfriend decides now is the time to have morning sex. Hike up my skirt, bend over and let him finish #noregrets." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Office Sex With The Boss 
"Last night I had sex with my manager. He's 45 and I'm 23. We did it in the office and man was it the best experience ever. The older the better!" 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Scandalous But Worth It 
"I crossed something off of my bucket list yesterday sex on the golf course! It was fantastic and in the middle of the day... slightly scandalous." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
So Intense That You Break Furniture 
"My parents were gone for the day and my boyfriend and I decided to have sex on their bed. We broke my parents' bed...." 
— Unknown Photo: Whisper 
Who Gave It To Her Best? 
"Best sex I ever had was after watching my ex get it from a stranger at the bar, and taking her home and having my way with her." 
— Unknown
